thread.title: I love this boutique hotel!
thread.title_full: I love this boutique hotel! - Review of Londres et New York Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Teresa E
title: I love this boutique hotel!
text:
I have stayed here three times and I love it. Great location, comfortable rooms, very good breakfast, helpful front desk staff (all the of staff is great). The hotel is directly across from the Gare St. Lazare, near the Op√©ra Garnier, Galeries Lafayette, Printemps, lots of restaurants, a great neighborhood overall.
Room Tip: Rooms on lower floors can hear the metro beginning early in the morning and late at night See more room tips
